data.title: Paul Randolph
data.meta_description: Mayor Paul Randolph is the mayor of Wellsbury, Massachusetts. He is portrayed by Scott Porter. Paul is the mayor of Wellsbury, Massachussetts. He meets Georgia at Blue Farm who suggests her give her a job and he tells her he'll think about it. Eventually, he hires her and they form a friendship...
data.text:
Mayor Paul Randolph is the mayor of Wellsbury, Massachusetts. He is portrayed by Scott Porter.

History[]

Background[]

Throughout The Series[]

Season 1[]

Paul is the mayor of Wellsbury, Massachussetts. He meets Georgia at Blue Farm who suggests her give her a job and he tells her he'll think about it. Eventually, he hires her and they form a friendship. Paul even offers to babysit Austin one night as a favor to Georgia. Paul finds credit cards opened in Austin's name at Georgia's house and confronts her about it but she lies and says it was Austin's dad who did that.

Georgia helps Paul plan several initiatives for the town, including a casino night. Her efforts are a success and impress Paul. Eventually they go out on a date and start a relationship.

Cynthia challenges Paul for his seat as mayor and they go against each other. However, Paul ends up winning another term.

Season 2[]

Paul and Georgia's relationship progress. He asks her to marry him and she says yes. He takes her to meet his parents, which doesn't go as expected. They start to plan the wedding and Paul reserves Georgia's dream spot using his mayoral connections.

Paul moves in with Georgia and starts to develop more of a relationship with her kids. He changes the town budget which upsets some of the parents in town because the school budget was decreased. Paul's parents try to talk him out of the wedding but he's set on it and in love with Georgia.

Georgia decides to come clean about her past and tell Paul everything except for the murders. She explains how Gil is blackmailing her and that Austin shot him. Shocked, Paul leaves.

Paul asks Georgia to come into his office to explain what’s happening with Gil to the police. Paul hires a family lawyer to prevent Gil from starting a custody battle. Paul tells Georgia he’s mad but he loves her and that they are a team. The wedding is still on.

Personality[]

Paul is a very friendly guy with a good heart.

Physical Appearance[]

Paul is tall, built, with brown hair.

Relationships[]

Family[]

Paul has two parents that live in a large house together. He also has a younger brother named Chris, who he mentions in Episode 4 of Season 2 when discussing Austin’s possible need for a 504 plan at school.

Friends[]

Romances[]

Georgia Miller (girlfriend turned fiance now wife)
